document.body:
Monica Vaughn’s Weblog
My Day with Ashlyn
August 31, 2008 at 2:36 am ( Uncategorized )
Today Ashlyn came over to play. We had a lot of fun. We went over to Gami and Gampa’s pool, played in my house and played outside. Overall it was a great day. Mom took a couple of pictures and a video of me swimming all by myself.
